data.eml:eml: A new species and new record of the leafhopper genus Seriana Dworakowska (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Typhlocybinae) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Song, Yuehua, Li, Zizhong (2012): A new species and new record of the leafhopper genus Seriana Dworakowska (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Typhlocybinae) from China. ZooKeys 172: 1-6, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.172.1741, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.172.1741
